mapper.select: SELECT SUM(number) AS numberByYear, DATE_FORMAT(exportTime,'%Y-%m') timeByYear FROM bus_export WHERE exportTime>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY timeByYear
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(number),0) AS number FROM bus_export WHERE TO_DAYS(exportTime) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
SELECT SUM(ex.number) AS value, gs.goodsName AS name FROM bus_export ex LEFT JOIN bus_goods gs ON ex.goodsId = gs.id GROUP BY ex.goodsId
